name: Tree Pose
description: Improves balance and posture, strengthens thighs and calves, mental focus

name: Lotus Pose
description: Lotus Pose is great for meditation and Pranayama practice. Much more stable than its counterparts. This asana allows the entire body to remain steady during a long period of time

name: Warrior I
description: improve the rotation of the hips and mobilize the spine. This pose offers a full body stretch and strengthening and improves breathing and circulation.

name: Chair Pose
description: mproves posture, tones the nervous system. Reinforce the legs, gluts and abdominal muscles. Stimulates the heart and diaphragm

name: Bridge Pose
description: relieves back pain, improves blood circulation, and calms the mind and the nervous system.

name: Supine Spinal Twist
description: massages and tones the abdominal organs and muscles.Relaxing the spine. Stretches the obliques, glutes and chest.

name: Triangle Pose
description: greatly improves hip joints rotation. Strengthen legs, upper back and shoulders. Also improve the digestion and tones the reproductive organs.

name: Half Standing forward Bend
description: corrects hyper kyphosis and tones abdominal muscles. Use as a transition pose during the flow

name: Warrior II
description: Improves circulation, strengthen your whole body, and open your hips. it also relieves your neck and back pain. This pose allows you to experiment with your centre of gravity as you align your body.

name: Child's Pose
description: This relaxing pose stretches your shoulders, chest, and low back. It increases flexibility in your spine, hips and thighs.

name: Butterfly Pose
description: It increases hip and groin flexibility, improved circulation in the pelvic area and potential release from menstrual discomfort and lower back pain.

name: Down Dog Pose
description: It is a wonderful stretch for the entire back of the body from head to toe. Inversion helps to bring oxygenated blood to the brain as well as giving a new perspective on the world.

name: Seated Side bend Pose
description: It is a soothing yoga pose that stretches neck, shoulders, back and obliques. This pose helps to relax the mind and relieve stress and anxiety.

name: Meditation pose
description: calm the mind, reduce stress, and improve cognitive function.

name: Basic yoga sitting
description: improved flexibility, enhanced core strength, better posture, reduced stress, and improved focus

name: Kneeling chair
description: improved flexibility, posture, and spinal alignment.

name: Extending chair
description: Scratch legs ,calves

name: Leg stretching
description: Stretch and relax legs knees pain

name: Peacock pose
description: Improved digestion, enhanced strength, in the arms and wrists and increased balance and coordination.

name: Tiger pose
description: improved spinal flexibility, stronger core muscles, enhanced digestion, and stress relief.

name: Half tortoise pose
description: It stretches the back, shoulder, neck, and hip, improves blood flow to the brain, enhance mental clarity and aids in digestion and elimination.

name: Cobra pose
description: strengthening the back and spine, improving flexibility and posture, and reducing stress and anxiety.
targeted_body_parts: primarily affects the spine and back muscles

name: Cow pose
description: improved spinal flexibility, back and neck pain relief, and improved digestion

name: Plow pose
description: strengthens the spine, improves flexibility in the shoulders, neck, and back, stimulates the thyroid gland, and can help alleviate stress and anxiety.

name: Half Split
description: Improve digestion, stress relief, increased spinal flexibility, and better circulation

name: Wheel
description: enable efficient movement, improve vehicle handling and stability, and can even be used for exercises like yoga.

name: Twisting triangle
description: strengthens and stretches the legs, opens the chest to improve breathing, relieves mild back pain, and improves your sense of balance.

name: Camel pose
description: Improves digestion, relief from lower back pain, and increased hip flexibility, help with menstrual discomfort and even boost confidence.

name: Lizard pose
description: Increases Hip flexibility, Releases tension in Groin, build strength in legs, open shoulders.

name: Side leg raises
description: Strengthen the outer hip muscles, tone the thighs, contribute to better posture, reduce risk of knee and hip injuries.

name: Single Leg Lift
description: Improves balance, enhance core strength, increase hip flexor strength, better overall stability.

name: Spine Stretch Forward
description: Improves spinal flexibility, reduce back pain, improve posture and muscle tension.

name: Lunge
description: Increase lower body strength, improves balance, enhance flexibility, and increase core strength.

name: Full body Stretch
description: Increase Flexibility
